ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] The only good dragon...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congrats!  We were at the other dragon on the Innoruuk server. Wow, was yesterday one really messed up day :). We buff up for Vox and run in, 20 seconds
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 17 Mar 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:

> ... is a dead dragon!

Congrats! We were at the other dragon on the Innoruuk server.
Wow, was yesterday one really messed up day :).

We buff up for Vox and run in, 20 seconds into the fight, 80% of
our healers get bugged by her fear or went LD. That's right -> 80% <-. I
got fear bugged with 90% mana along with 3 or 4 others and a few went LD.
We had 3 functioning healers that entire battle. Well, we still got Lady
Vox down to a sliver before our damage output dropped to nothing.

A little CR, pause for a snack.

Our second run we only had 2 healers get bugged (which is about
the average and we had 2 casualties total. That's the way it's supposed
to happen :P.

Harmonic came along as a guest this trip, so he got to see both
the guild at its worst and best :).

Actually, Vox was very similar in items. Nag's CoF -> Vox's RBB.
Nag's scale -> Vox's scale. 2 GPK's -> 2 weight reducing pouches....
err... Nevermind :).

Vox just got really lucky with her fear bugging the healers, I've
never seen so many people get fear bugged in so short a period of time.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
